title: Our Work
text: We quantify history and the social sciences to learn about in/justice & futurity.

title: Our Work
text:
QUANT SHOP DATA
Our lab works to identify sources of information for engagement and analyses across historical, contemporary, and future-oriented perspectives. These data are meant to support critical quantitative analyses.
Data sources, software programs, and code are outlined below.

title: Lesson 1
text:
The Quantitative Histories Workshop Model
Prep
Code and data prep should follow the Good enough practices in scientific computing model.
Analysis
Analyses can be done in any software program and a clear summary of steps should be included.
Reporting
All reports should be generated using an .RMrakdown.
Case study
To explore this 3-step model, we will use a case study as found in Lesson 02.
